channel.title: [Release] Some sprites [Release
channel.description:
http://www.4shared.com/file/106659743/3bd520b5/Sprites.html
Updated it. Plate and Helm + some other stuff.
All are in Png and .SPR files.
You will need to compress it into sprites.rscd as i forrgot to upload it. All sprites are tested and work perfect ty to a few help.
Plate: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/351-1.png[/img]
Helm: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/312.png[/img]
Skull when you pk: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2013.png[/img]
Bottoms: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2025-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2026-2.png[/img]
When you klick on the floor: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2015.png[/img]
When you klick on a person: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/2020.png[/img]
Enjo, my self i would like to see them in a pk server
Ingame picture: [IMG]http://i274.photobucket.com/albums/jj267/uberpker/namnls-2.jpg[/img]

ima pack them and upload them here 2.

item.title: [Release] Some sprites [Release
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Godandjesus, post:14, topic:278880”]shift = false

Thats why its overgrown mate.[/quote]

oh, well now it released will get into it when im home again.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 10:18:42 pm[/size][hr][quote=“yong min, post:15, topic:278880”]Nice helmet

Did you ever work on rest of the armour? Would have been nice to actually release it as a full set. Nonetheless, it’s something different that’s been released, so good job. +1 ;)[/quote]

Yea i made this without adding it into .spr, but i accidently deleted them.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2009, 10:19:36 pm[/size][hr][quote=“darscape, post:17, topic:278880”]Some of these sprites were made for DARScape but only a few were selected to be used. The above ones are not ones that are in use today.[/quote]

They can’t since this is the first time i shown them.

Read full topic

[quote author=[A]mpd link=topic=368112.msg2787823#msg2787823 date=1242582702]
Wow! I’ll Rep++ you for sure!

Awesome sprites!

the thing is… ppl like u cant rep bc your new and annoying.
[/quote]

Annoying? I think not! In fact, that was my only “spam” post

Oh and, I’m not new
[/quote]
Date Registered: May 16, 2009, 02:22:10 pm

not new my ass.[/quote]

I know! It’s impossible for me to have OTHER accounts!

Edit:

[quote=“pesterd, post:9, topic:278880”]clearly are…

josh… from where?
KingPK?[/quote]

No, Eli, I’m not THAT Josh.
